r.s: The plugins for PEAR_PackageFileManager to pick up what files to use, supported are File, CVS, SVN, Perforce
r.d:
The plugins for PEAR_PackageFileManager to pick up what files to use. Supported are * File * CVS * SVN * Perforce
This package is to be used with PackageFileManager v1 and v2 and can't be used on it's own
r.n: * Fixed Bug #17462: SVN entries file regression (Applies to CVS as well) [dufuz] * Fixed Bug #18033: _getRegExpableSearchString() in File.php causes issue with paths (Applies to CVS as well) [dufuz]
